rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Pharika’s Harbinger deals combat damage to a player, bless target creature that player controls. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has “At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can’t, you lose 3 life.”
